articles.title: Anti-Asian hate-crime bill passes Senate 94-1, with only Republican Sen. Josh Hawley voting against it - Business Insider
articles.description: In a remarkable show of bipartisanship, the bill passed the Senate 94-1. It addresses the spike in violence against Asian Americans.
articles.content:
The Senate on Thursday passed a bill addressing the rise in violence and discrimination against Asian American and Pacific Islander communities during the coronavirus pandemic.
